title: Alison Sherwood, Author at WebMD

sections.heading: Overview
content: Alison Sherwood is a freelance writer for WebMD. She has been a journalist for more than 15 years, contributing features on a variety of health and lifestyle topics to WebMD for the past six years.

She previously worked for the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel as a multimedia journalist, where she and four colleagues were awarded the Pulitzer Prize for Explanatory Reporting for a series on a young boy’s mysterious illness. She also covered food and lifestyle and was an active member of the Association of Food Journalists.
She graduated magna cum laude from the University of Missouri with degrees in journalism and Spanish.
Sherwood lives in the Chicago area with her husband and five young kids. She enjoys serving in her church and dragging her family along on hikes and outdoor adventures.
